flowchart LR
    subgraph build["Build"]
        build_step0["Compile"]
    end
    subgraph unit_test["Unit Test"]
        unit_test_step0["Run unit"]
    end
    subgraph integration["Integration"]
        integration_step0["Run integ"]
    end
    subgraph lint["Lint"]
        lint_step0["Run lint"]
    end

    build --> unit_test
    build --> integration
    build --> lint
